mapper.select: SELECT id FROM blog_file WHERE file_parent = #{parent.id} AND file_path = #{path}
mapper.update: UPDATE blog_file SET file_rgt = file_rgt + 2 WHERE file_rgt > #{lft}; UPDATE blog_file SET file_lft = file_lft + 2 WHERE file_lft > #{lft};
mapper.select: SELECT bf.id, file_name, file_type, file_createDate, file_lft, file_rgt, file_parent , bcf.id AS cf_id, file_extension, file_size, file_store, file_server, file_originalname, file_width, file_height, file_lastmodifydate, file_path FROM blog_file bf LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_common_file bcf ON bcf.id = bf.common_file WHERE bf.id = #{id}

SELECT parent.id, parent.file_name, parent.file_type, parent.file_createDate, parent.file_lft, parent.file_rgt, parent.file_parent, parent.file_path, file_lastmodifydate FROM blog_file AS parent WHERE file_lft <= #{lft} AND file_rgt >= #{rgt}
SELECT file_type, COUNT(id) AS file_count FROM blog_file WHERE file_lft > #{lft} AND file_rgt < #{rgt} GROUP BY file_type
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(file_size),0) FROM blog_file bf LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_common_file bcf ON bf.`common_file` = bcf.`id` WHERE file_lft > #{lft} AND file_rgt < #{rgt}
SELECT bf.id, file_lft, file_rgt FROM blog_file bf WHERE file_parent IS NULL
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM blog_common_file WHERE id IN (SELECT common_file FROM blog_file bf WHERE file_lft >= #{lft} AND file_rgt <= #{rgt})
mapper.update: UPDATE blog_file SET file_rgt = file_rgt - #{width} WHERE file_rgt > #{rgt}; UPDATE blog_file SET file_lft = file_lft - #{width} WHERE file_lft > #{rgt};
mapper.select: SELECT bf.id, file_name, file_type, file_createDate, file_lft, file_rgt, file_parent , bcf.id AS cf_id, file_extension, file_size, file_store, file_server, file_originalname, file_width, file_height, file_lastmodifydate, file_path FROM blog_file bf LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_common_file bcf ON bcf.id = bf.common_file WHERE bf.file_lft >= #{lft} AND bf.file_rgt <= #{rgt}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM blog_common_file WHERE id NOT IN(SELECT common_file FROM blog_file bf WHERE bf.`common_file` IS NOT NULL )
